content.question: In lines 2-3, tua tela tenens supplex hostem fugit is translated

choices.label: she flees the hostile suppliant, holding your spear
the enemy, holding the suppliant, flees your spear
she, as a suppliant, holding your spear, flees the enemy
the suppliant flees the enemy that is held back by your spear

content.answer: she, as a suppliant, holding your spear, flees the enemy

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
